About

I am a software developer, convinced agilist and trainer with over 14 years experience developing highly scalable web/mobile/backend applications, optimizing work processes and leading dev teams. I am currently interested by Functional Programming, DevOps, and distributed systems. I also give presentations at various events, play the guitar, love music and Taekwondo.

I currently work at Yoppworks as a Lead Consultant.

Scala, Akka, Spark, Cats, Java, Haskell, Object Oriented / Functional Programming, Reactive Architectures, Terraform, AWS
